item.title: Car Dashcam Video Recording project - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking enthusiastic individuals from around the world to join our project as Dashcam Video Recorders. The task involves recording high-resolution videos using a car dashcam while driving in various locations within your country. This is a great opportunity for anyone who enjoys driving and wants to earn extra income by simply recording their journeys.
Responsibilities:
Record high-quality, high-resolution videos using a car dashcam.
Ensure the videos are clear, stable, and provide a good view of the surroundings.
Capture videos in different locations within your country, including urban areas, highways, and rural roads.
Submit the recorded videos as per the guidelines provided.
Requirements:
Access to a car equipped with a high-resolution dashcam.
Ability to record videos in different parts of your country.
Attention to detail to ensure video quality meets the required standards.
Reliable internet connection to upload the recorded videos.
Payment:
The rate for this task is $2 per hour of recorded video.
Payments will be made upon the successful submission and verification of the videos.
How to Apply:
If you are interested in this opportunity, please submit your application with the following details:
Your name and contact information.
The make and model of your dashcam.
The regions or cities where you can record videos.
Any previous experience with similar tasks (not mandatory).
Join us in this exciting project and get paid to explore your surroundings while helping us collect valuable data from different parts of the world!

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 27, 2024 12:20 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Car, Videography
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Car, Videography
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Sports YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a YouTube Video Editor!
Job details:

Niche: Sports
Number of videos: Around 1-2 Per Week.
Length of videos: Around 7-12 minutes long.
Turnaround Time: 24-48 hrs per video (No Later Than 48 Hours)
Duration of job: We are looking for a Long-Term relationship (1+ Years)

Hey there! Thank you for considering our job post. We are looking for an experienced Video Editor with previous experience working for YouTube channels.

We run multiple channels and are starting a new one in the sports niche. We will be creating videos on the following topics (initially):

• WHAT IF • CRAZY SPORTS STORIES/FACTS
The video editor will be given a script and a voice over, his/her job will be to create a really complete and engaging video using that voice over and by performing the following tasks:

Add background music
Add existing clips from other videos (Under fair use)
Add images
Add stock footage
Add Sound FX
Add transitions and titles
Among other tasks

Here is an example of the type of videos we are looking for: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qy7ZtlcGeEg&t=5s and https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X7lQQaliWjQ

Having advanced English or being bilingual is a MUST, as well as being creative.

You also need to be a resourceful since this job requires you to find online content that will help your video be more engaging and make it more impactful.

Some of the requirements to apply:
- Advanced video editing skills
- Previous experience working for YouTube channels (faceless channels preferred)
- Have access to Storyblocks or similar for stock images and clips.
- Creativity to enhance the video by making the script come to live (use of Sound FX, transitions, change in pacing, etc)

Please bid your price per video and send me some of your recent work [THIS IS A MUST].

Start your bid with Example: "Banana Milkshake", so we know you have read the post and understand the scope of the job.

Thanks in advance for your interest, and good luck.

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 27, 2024 12:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Videography, Documentary, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Videography, Documentary, Adobe After Effects
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: UGC videos for product video ads (girls) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a UGC content creator to produce high-quality video ads (each of under 60 seconds) for 4 products in the skin care and wellness industry. Products like face serum, face mask, breast oil, Weight gainer, libido booster,  bum and back cream. As a content creator, you will be responsible for conceptualizing, shooting, editing, and delivering engaging video content that highlights the benefits and features of our products. This role requires a strong understanding of UGC trends and the ability to create content that resonates with our target audience.

    Key skills:
    - Video production
    - Video editing
    - Storyboarding
    - Content ideation
    - Creative direction
    - Knowledge of skin care and wellness industry

    Time frame: Under 60 Second

item.title: Video Editor for a YouTube Channel Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a video editor who has experience with editing youtube documentary style videos. This is what style and type of editing we require, following the exact same format:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mBcfEOqdNLI

Voice-over and script will be provided. Video length will be around 10-12 minutes, 15 minutes max in some cases. The payout per video will start at $50-$60 depending on video length and will increase in the future if the work is satisfactory and follows the above standards.

Responsibilities:

- Source and incorporate relevant content, including images, clips, animations and audio.
- Implement hooks, retention strategies, and other techniques to maintain viewer engagement.
- Ensure all videos are consistent with our brand's style and quality standards.
- Collaborate closely with our team to understand the vision and goals for each video.
- Deliver projects on time while maintaining high standards of quality.

This is will be a long-term project with weekly payouts. We need someone who can provide a relatively quick turnover of 2-3 days and has good communication skills.

Please only apply if you can cover the above requirements.





Budget: $60
Posted On: June 27, 2024 12:06 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects
Country: BGR

item.title: Motion Designer for Animated Product Video in English and Arabic - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced Animator/motion designer to create a 3-minute product video that showcases our new product's features (a skills intelligence platform), benefits, and uses. The video will be used across various marketing platforms, including our website, social media, and email campaigns. The final product will include both English and Arabic versions. Additionally, the project will involve creating standalone short videos derived from the final 3-minute video.

Style Reference:

https://www.pinterest.com/pin/645070346655122356/
https://www.pinterest.com/pin/838584393141716408/
https://www.pinterest.com/pin/312296555426511700/
https://pin.it/4oMCGItY6
https://pin.it/39i5hQJzy

Responsibilities:

1. Collaborate with our team to understand the product and script.
2. Develop a creative concept and storyboard based on provided visual references, script, creative direction, and brand guidelines.
3. Produce a 3-minute product video, including both English and Arabic versions.
4. Incorporate graphics, animations, and voiceovers as needed. (we will provide the VO)
5. Make necessary revisions based on our feedback.
6. Create standalone short videos from the final 3-minute video.
7. Provide all source files used in the production upon final delivery.

Requirements:

1. Proven experience in English/Arabic video production, including concept development, storyboarding, and motion design.
2. Proficiency in Adobe video editing software (e.g., Adobe After Effects and Premiere).
3. Ability to produce high-quality videos in both English and Arabic.
4. Strong understanding of visual storytelling.
5. Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
6. Ability to meet deadlines and deliver high-quality work on time.

How to Apply:

Please submit previous work samples in English and Arabic.


Posted On: June 27, 2024 12:03 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Animation, 2D Animation, Product Video, Storyboarding, Storytelling, Video Production, Video Animation
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Animation, 2D Animation, Product Video, Storyboarding, Storytelling, Video Production, Video Animation
Country: Bahrain
click to apply

item.title: Looking for Professional Videographer match and re-create SFX and audio in a sped-up video - Upwork
item.description:
Hello, I’m looking for a Videographer to accurately recreate and add SFX to an opening clip for a game called Save the Queen.

We recently sped up the original video by 5% as we found the original cut to be too long but noticed that the pacing of the narration was too quick even with such a small change in video speed.

Your task would be to match the ambience and feel of the original, IN the sped up video and match the SFX as closely as humanly possible to the original.

We have the following Resources we can share with you

1. The original video to use as a sound/timing/SFX reference

2. The Sped up Video for which the sound has to be re-created

3. All the Narration and Music in its original non sped up format

4. Certain SFX such as the bell, ticking clock, guards marching, unfortunately we do not have majority of the SFX used in the original, so we would rely on a freelancer with access to a library and a good ear to recreate the sounds as closely as we can. As you can hear in the original video the are quite a few different sounds ranging from whooshes, bangs, water effects, cheering within the project.

5. .AEP files given to us by the original videographer however it is believed that these are incomplete. We could not locate all the sounds within the folders shared with us.

We’re hoping to get this sorted within the next 24 hours, we create plenty video projects and if all goes well we have plenty more videos to create, from short promo’s to longer game ads!

Best Regards
Dominik


Budget: $50
Posted On: June 27, 2024 11:45 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Audio Editing, Audio Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Post Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Audio Editing, Audio Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Post Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Country: Singapore
click to apply

item.title: Content Marketing Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly creative and experienced Content Marketing Specialist who will be responsible for creating engaging and visually appealing content across our portfolio of brands. Your role will include developing social media content, designing graphics for email banners and landing pages, and creating marketing/sales documents and pitch decks. You will work closely with our marketing team to ensure that all content aligns with our brand guidelines and marketing objectives.

Responsibilities
1. Social Media Content Creation:
    * Develop and manage social media content for multiple brands within our portfolio.
    * Create engaging posts, reels, stories, and campaigns that resonate with our target audience.
    * Schedule and publish social media content across various platforms using content schedulers like Buffer.
2. Graphic Design:
    * Design eye-catching graphics for email banners, landing pages, and other digital assets.
    * Ensure all graphics align with brand guidelines and enhance the overall visual appeal of our campaigns.
    * Collaborate with the email marketing team to create visually compelling email templates.
3. Marketing and Sales Collateral:
    * Create high-quality marketing and sales documents, including brochures, flyers, and pitch decks.
    * Work closely with the sales team to develop customized presentations and materials for client pitches.
    * Ensure all materials are consistent with our branding and effectively communicate our value proposition.
4. Video Content Creation:
    * Produce and edit video content for social media, websites, and other marketing channels.
    * Utilize platforms such as Premiere Pro and After Effects to create dynamic and engaging videos.
    * Collaborate with the marketing team to develop video concepts and storyboards.
5. Content Strategy and Planning:
    * Develop and execute content strategies that align with overall marketing objectives.
    * Conduct research to understand our target audience and industry trends.
    * Plan and manage content calendars to ensure timely and consistent delivery of content.
6. Collaboration and Communication:
    * Work closely with the marketing, sales, and product teams to ensure cohesive messaging across all channels.
    * Participate in brainstorming sessions to generate new content ideas and strategies.
    * Provide regular updates and reports on content performance and engagement metrics.

Requirements
* Proven experience as a Content Marketing Specialist or similar role, preferably within the sports event or related industry.
* Proficiency in Canva, Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Premiere Pro, After Effects, and/or other content creation platforms.
* Strong understanding of social media platforms and best practices for content creation.
* Excellent graphic design skills with a keen eye for detail and aesthetics.
* Ability to create and edit video content for various marketing channels.
* Strong written and verbal communication skills.
* Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines.
* Creative thinking and ability to generate innovative content ideas.
* Familiarity with our target audience and industry trends is a plus.
Preferred Qualifications:
* Knowledge of the sports industry and familiarity with our brands.

item.ns0:encoded:
We are seeking a highly creative and experienced Content Marketing Specialist who will be responsible for creating engaging and visually appealing content across our portfolio of brands. Your role will include developing social media content, designing graphics for email banners and landing pages, and creating marketing/sales documents and pitch decks. You will work closely with our marketing team to ensure that all content aligns with our brand guidelines and marketing objectives.

Responsibilities
1. Social Media Content Creation:
    * Develop and manage social media content for multiple brands within our portfolio.
    * Create engaging posts, reels, stories, and campaigns that resonate with our target audience.
    * Schedule and publish social media content across various platforms using content schedulers like Buffer.
2. Graphic Design:
    * Design eye-catching graphics for email banners, landing pages, and other digital assets.
    * Ensure all graphics align with brand guidelines and enhance the overall visual appeal of our campaigns.
    * Collaborate with the email marketing team to create visually compelling email templates.
3. Marketing and Sales Collateral:
    * Create high-quality marketing and sales documents, including brochures, flyers, and pitch decks.
    * Work closely with the sales team to develop customized presentations and materials for client pitches.
    * Ensure all materials are consistent with our branding and effectively communicate our value proposition.
4. Video Content Creation:
    * Produce and edit video content for social media, websites, and other marketing channels.
    * Utilize platforms such as Premiere Pro and After Effects to create dynamic and engaging videos.
    * Collaborate with the marketing team to develop video concepts and storyboards.
5. Content Strategy and Planning:
    * Develop and execute content strategies that align with overall marketing objectives.
    * Conduct research to understand our target audience and industry trends.
    * Plan and manage content calendars to ensure timely and consistent delivery of content.
6. Collaboration and Communication:
    * Work closely with the marketing, sales, and product teams to ensure cohesive messaging across all channels.
    * Participate in brainstorming sessions to generate new content ideas and strategies.
    * Provide regular updates and reports on content performance and engagement metrics.

Requirements
* Proven experience as a Content Marketing Specialist or similar role, preferably within the sports event or related industry.
* Proficiency in Canva, Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Premiere Pro, After Effects, and/or other content creation platforms.
* Strong understanding of social media platforms and best practices for content creation.
* Excellent graphic design skills with a keen eye for detail and aesthetics.
* Ability to create and edit video content for various marketing channels.
* Strong written and verbal communication skills.
* Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines.
* Creative thinking and ability to generate innovative content ideas.
* Familiarity with our target audience and industry trends is a plus.
Preferred Qualifications:
* Knowledge of the sports industry and familiarity with our brands.


Hourly Range: $12.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 11:32 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Content Creation, Instagram, TikTok, Content Writing, Content Marketing, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Social Media Content Creation, Instagram, TikTok, Content Writing, Content Marketing, Social Media Marketing

item.title: 📷 Need work? Cash Cow Videos? Total Cost Per Video? - Upwork
item.description:
To Apply: Quote me how much you will charge me PER VIDEO, for everything.  

You can leverage as many AI tools as you need to like: Pictory, Eleven Labs, Gamma AI, whatever you need to use.

Looking for someone that can make videos for my youtube channel here:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOB-5jnfDH24_pHVawul57g

looking for someone that will give me a total cost PER video.

That means everything, scriptwriting, thumbnail etc...
and a humanized voice over using eleven labs or a similar tool that passes the youtube monetization standards.

Please tell me how much you will charge me for each 10 minute video. TOTAL.  Total price.

I will not consider anything else except for a clear total price.

I'm really looking for someone that's hungry to get experience and knows they can do that, and will be happy with getting paid PER VIDEO and doing it all.

I'm not trying to waste anyone's time, so please do not reply if you do not give me a total per video based on the youtube channel I am showing you.

Thank you very much.

Hourly Range: $3.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 11:23 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Subtitles, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics

item.title: Video Editor for Simple Text and Overlay B Roll - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can help us with our video editing needs. The main task will be to add simple text and overlay B roll to our videos. We would like to see a sample video showcasing your editing skills before making a final decision.
  The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing and be proficient in using video editing software. Attention to detail and creativity are important for this role.
  Skills required:
  - Video editing
  - Text overlay
  - B roll editing
  - Attention to detail
  - Creativity
